imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fresh produce banner with vibrant vegetables on wooden background (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Organic farming landscape with green fields (organic-section.dim_800x500.png)
- Shopping basket filled with colorful vegetables (promo-basket.dim_600x600.png)
- Farm-to-table concept illustration (farm-to-table.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Add new images to the application as specified by the user in the image requirements section
Integrate the newly generated images into appropriate locations within the Smart Shop interface
